name: layers-ui
description: A lightweight utility-first CSS library with theming support

scripts.clean:published: rm -rf layers.css layers.css.map layers.min.css layers.min.css.map fonts
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:published
scripts.build-all: npm run build:scss && npm run build:scss:min && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
scripts.copy:docs: mkdir -p docs/layers && cp dist/layers.css docs/layers/layers.css && mkdir -p docs/layers/fonts && cp dist/fonts/* docs/layers/fonts/
scripts.copy:published: mkdir -p fonts && cp dist/layers.css . && cp dist/layers.css.map . && cp dist/layers.min.css . && cp dist/layers.min.css.map . && cp dist/fonts/* ./fonts/
scripts.copy-all: npm run copy:dist && npm run copy:docs && npm run copy:published
scripts.build: npm run clean-all && npm run build-all && npm run copy-all
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "chore: publish new version" && git push origin main && npm publish --access public

author: Athreya M R
